chapter.title: Core concepts
chapter.para: Concepts and procedures for working with WASP.

section.title: Data Model
section.para:
The WASP data model is managed with the object-relational mapping tool Hibernate. Model classes are defined in the package edu.yu.einstein.wasp.model of the wasp-core module. Consult the
JavaDoc for detailed information regarding the WASP data model.

section.title: State
section.para: State is a central concept to dealing with data in WASP. Every real world event defined within WASP is assigned a state. WASP defines default states, but developers can extend the state system to suit their requirements. An event's state may simply be a record of progress through a well defined series of events in a web-flow, or it can be used to manage interactions bet ween user submissions, human interaction events, and analytical processing.
